title: Pie Maker Crumpets
directions: Sift together in a bowl, flour, baking powder, sugar and salt.
Dissolve yeast in warm water, add to dry ingredients, beat until smooth.
Lightly grease a frying pan and the inside of egg rings.
Place rings in pan to heat. When hot, reduce heat and fill with batter, allowing space for mixture to rise.
Cook for 10 minutes over low heat or until crumpets have holes in surface, remove rings from pan.
Cover pan, and cook for 3 minutes until set.
